I had a shop at threadless but I shut it down 3 months ago. They where really slow at delivering but they have apparently gotten better now.
Thank you :)
Haha, I like that too
Thank you :D

Thank you :)
Thank you and yes in the near future that will be possible, but I think you have to pm me for that.
Yepp yepp, https://www.instagram.com/thedeadpigeon/
I usually just get a feeling or a shape in my head and then I draw it as soon as I get the time.
Thank you, If you mean the diagonal shadow over the whole paper thats from my window and I thought it looked cool so yes that was intentional in that way ;)
This is just fucking fantastic!
Im happy that you are happy :D

WRITING.TITLE: Trials of life, Copics and Ink, A4

WRITING.TEXT: Personally I have realized that depression is like a super power that sucks if you lose control over it.
Thank you, there are prints in my print store but they are not super broke college student friendly but I am working on something of another medium that is a bit cheaper.

Thank you, The upside down cross is pretty much just aesthetic, Also I like the menacing undertone it gives the pictures. I am trying to balance things that are sort of dark looking at the same time visually pleasing and positive. Its neither good or bad.
Haha
It will be available soonish, and you are pretty on point with that interpretation. Thank you
No problem, have a good day :)
Thank you :)
Thank you, In a way I guess I have that but it's mostly up to the person viewing it. I think you would have to stalk trough my instagram.
Thank you, here is one: https://www.instagram.com/p/BELFUbCs6_L/?taken-by=deadpigeontattoo
Yes, if you pm me.
I would not recommend them because of the cost. However you can refill them so that's nice.
Thank you :)
Ballpoint pen first

Hey man, what are you going on about? Maybe you should double check who writes what in the comments. I havent said anything about your knowledge of art.
This drawing in short is about self-imposed bounderies and fears, letting small and trivial things controll you.
The drawing is a product of my mind yes, but the topic is something else. I really don't see the problem here :P
Haha I'm sorry and happy at the same time :) Thank you
And thank you :)
I am a tattoo artist in Tokyo
Here you go, this is all of it: https://www.instagram.com/thedeadpigeon/ Thank you and have a great day.

Thank you! oh, well we got this group offer from Satan, If we all sold our souls at the same time the torture would only be not having the right power cord for our playstation 666 in hell. No but honestly I have no idea why others do it, I just like the contrast between pretty colors and dark subjects.
Paper is from a whole-sale office supplier in Sweden. The ink is a hi-tec ballpoint pen.
Oh and no, not Don but I can see it now when it has been pointed out.

Long story short super short. Drew a weird giraffe in a moment of rage after I had been cut of from an internet providers phone support (after a long waiting time) Looked kind of cool, kept on drawing little creatures over and over again every morning 7am for a year straight. Then it sort of became a part of me and now I can't stop.
Thank you!
Haha well, that's one way of viewing the drawing :)
Thanks!
I sometimes stream when I am drawing on instagram. I have this very shitty video from 4, soon to be 5 years ago... https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T5m2HPItLBk "Enjoy"

Yes I have, but I gave up fast though :p However I was not thinking about the game when drawing this but as I finished the drawing I realised that people would make Dark souls and bloodborne comments about it.
Need to let what go?
I think you are guessing right ;)
Haha cool, no it's only 1/3 of it
Nope it's not from anything
Well, I think copics feels more like controlled water color then other markers but I haven't tried all brands, It's mostly that the art store closest to my appartment has copics. Thank you
Now when you mention it, yes
Thank you, I love hearing how the drawing comes across!
Thank you! The best way to interact with me and see my designs is on my instagram. That is my main hub. https://www.instagram.com/thedeadpigeon/
It's a little bit more too it ;)
In a way yes,

Thank you, yes I did it this morning :) I decided not to write exactly what I was thinking when I did this as it gets more interesting for me to see how other people view it. Thank you for sharing your thoughts :)
Thank you!

This one was a lot of fun to draw. I tried only using warm and cold grays but in the end I had to add a little bit of color to it as well. Hope you like it :)
If anybody want to see more of my drawings I got them here: https://www.instagram.com/thedeadpigeon/
